exercises.name: Pelvic Tilt
exercises.instructions: Gently flatten the lower back toward the surface by tightening the core.

exercises.name: Knees to Chest
exercises.instructions: Bring knees toward chest until a mild stretch is felt. Breathe normally.

exercises.name: Bird Dog
exercises.instructions: From hands and knees, extend opposite arm and leg, keep trunk stable, return slowly.

exercises.name: Glute Bridge
exercises.instructions: Lift hips by squeezing glutes, keep ribs down, lower with control.
